interface.name: qt_shm_emulation_server_buffer

description.summary: shm-based server buffer for testing on desktop

interface.description: This is software-based implementation of the qt_server_buffer extension. It is intended for testing and debugging purposes only.

event.name: server_buffer_created
event.description: Informs the client about a newly created server buffer. The "key" argument contains a QSharedMemory key.
